DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Lithium is safe and effective in the treatment of Bipolar I Disorder subjects with symptoms of acute mania.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Lithium in Bipolar Disorder
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of Bipolar 1 Disorder; Hospitalized or in the process of being hospitalized for a manic or mixed episode History of rapid cycling; History of hypersensitivity or adverse reaction to lithium
